entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow late this evening. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:07 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 5:07 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
